code: @Manual{,   title = {Mealsuggestor: Recipe Filtering and Suggestion Tool},   author = {Samy Maurer and Zhiqi Freng and Efthimis Katsiapis and Shuangfei Li},   year = {2023},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000}, }

title: Recipe Filtering and Suggestion Tool
text: Welcome Meal Suggestor package! R package designed make meal planning easier enjoyable. Utilizing comprehensive dataset diverse recipes, package offers tailored meal suggestions based user preferences cuisine type, dietary restrictions, preparation time. Whether cooking enthusiast just looking daily meal inspiration, package help explore world culinary possibilities.

title: Recipe Filtering and Suggestion Tool
text: Found dataset Kaggle, whcih contains 8000 food recipes cuisines across globe (major focus Indian Dishes). dataset, can get information food recipes, approximate cooking preparation times, cooking instructions,ingredients used, Recipe Author Ratings. , enhance readability analyzability dataset, preprocessing performed. Initially, unnecessary columns removed. Subsequently, certain columns underwent format conversion.

title: Recipe Filtering and Suggestion Tool
text: Cuisine Filter: Find meals specific cuisines like Mexican, Italian, Indian, . Dietary Considerations: Filter recipes based dietary needs vegetarian, vegan, gluten-free options. Preparation Cooking Time: Choose recipes based time available, quick snacks elaborate dinners. Ingredient-based Suggestions: Get recommendations based ingredients already home.

title: Recipe Filtering and Suggestion Tool
text: install Meal Suggestion package, use following command R:

title: Recipe Filtering and Suggestion Tool
text: Meal Suggestor offers variety functions different needs preferences meal planning: filter_by_time() Use filter_by_time() find recipes matching available cooking preparation time. get_recipes() Discover recipes based combination criteria get_recipes(). get_top_n_recipes() Retrieve top-rated recipes using get_top_n_recipes(). random_recipe() Let random_recipe() surprise random meal suggestion. sort_recipes() Organize recipe search results sort_recipes() based criteria like preparation time rating.

what: Integrated Shiny App for Interactive Meal Planning
title: Recipe Filtering and Suggestion Tool
text: Meal Suggestor also includes interactive Shiny app, enhancing meal planning experience. Launch R console input preferences receive meal suggestions:

what: Filter Recipes by Preparation and Cooking Time — filter_by_time
title: Filter Recipes by Preparation and Cooking Time — filter_by_time
text: function filters recipes based specified minimum maximum preparation cooking times.

title: Filter Recipes by Preparation and Cooking Time — filter_by_time
code: filter_by_time(   data,   min_prep_time = 0,   max_prep_time = Inf,   min_cook_time = 0,   max_cook_time = Inf )

title: Filter Recipes by Preparation and Cooking Time — filter_by_time
text: data Data frame containing recipes. min_prep_time Minimum allowed preparation time minutes (default 0). max_prep_time Maximum allowed preparation time minutes (default Inf). min_cook_time Minimum allowed cooking time minutes (default 0). max_cook_time Maximum allowed cooking time minutes (default Inf).

title: Filter Recipes by Preparation and Cooking Time — filter_by_time
text: data frame recipes filtered specified time constraints.

title: Filter Recipes by Preparation and Cooking Time — filter_by_time
code: filter_by_time(data = recipes, min_prep_time = 10, max_prep_time = 30,                min_cook_time = 20, max_cook_time = 60) #> # A tibble: 4,049 × 10 #>    recipe_title      rating description cuisine course diet  prep_time cook_time #>    <chr>              <dbl> <chr>       <chr>   <chr>  <chr>     <dbl>     <dbl> #>  1 Thakkali Gotsu R…   4.93  also know… South … Lunch  Vege…        10        20 #>  2 Rajma Kofta In M…   4.83 Koftas are… North … Side … High…        20        30 #>  3 Barnyard Millet …   4.90 is a flavo… Indian  Lunch  Vege…        10        30 #>  4 Karnataka Style …   4.87 Karnataka … Karnat… South… Vege…        10        30 #>  5 Schezwan Style C…   4.93 Love samos… North … Snack  Vege…        10        45 #>  6 Pineapple Upside…   4.78 The Classi… Contin… Desse… Vege…        20        40 #>  7 Toffee Banana Re…   4.87 Toffee ban… Chinese Desse… Vege…        10        60 #>  8 Kurkuri Bhindi A…   4.62 Kurkuri Bh… North … Lunch  Vege…        15        45 #>  9 Kela Matar ki Sa…   4.94 Kela Matar… North … Lunch  No O…        15        20 #> 10 Creamy Chicken P…   4.90 The   is a… Italia… Dinner High…        10        20 #> # ℹ 4,039 more rows #> # ℹ 2 more variables: ingredients <chr>, instructions <chr>

what: Filter Recipes Based on Various Criteria — get_recipes
title: Filter Recipes Based on Various Criteria — get_recipes
text: function filters recipes dataset based provided criteria ingredients, cuisine, diet, maximum preparation time, maximum cooking time.

title: Filter Recipes Based on Various Criteria — get_recipes
code: get_recipes(data, ingredients = NULL, cuisine = NULL, diet = NULL)

title: Filter Recipes Based on Various Criteria — get_recipes
text: data Data frame containing recipes. ingredients Vector ingredients filtering cuisine String specifying cuisine type filtering diet String specifying diet type filtering

title: Filter Recipes Based on Various Criteria — get_recipes
text: data frame filtered recipes.

title: Filter Recipes Based on Various Criteria — get_recipes
code: get_recipes(data, ingredients = c("tomato", "chicken"),            cuisine = "Italian", diet = "Gluten Free") #> Error in data$ingredients: object of type 'closure' is not subsettable

title: Recipes for mealgenerator — recipes
Recipes for mealgenerator — recipes
text: data frame 6503 observations following 10 variables. recipe_title character vector rating numeric vector description character vector cuisine character vector course character vector diet character vector prep_time numeric vector cook_time numeric vector ingredients character vector instructions character vector

title: Recipes for mealgenerator — recipes

what: Sort Recipes by Specified Criteria — sort_recipes
title: Sort Recipes by Specified Criteria — sort_recipes
text: function sorts recipes based specified column order.

title: Sort Recipes by Specified Criteria — sort_recipes
Sort Recipes by Specified Criteria — sort_recipes
text: data Data frame containing recipes. sort_by column name sort (e.g., "rating", "prep_time"). ascending Boolean; TRUE, sorts ascending order, else descending order.

title: Sort Recipes by Specified Criteria — sort_recipes
text: sorted data frame recipes.

title: Sort Recipes by Specified Criteria — sort_recipes
code: sort_recipes(data = recipes, sort_by = "rating", ascending = FALSE) #> # A tibble: 6,503 × 10 #>    recipe_title      rating description cuisine course diet  prep_time cook_time #>    <chr>              <dbl> <chr>       <chr>   <chr>  <chr>     <dbl>     <dbl> #>  1 Savory Shrimps O…      5 Savory Shr… Indian  Appet… Non …        20         8 #>  2 Chilli Oil Recipe      5 This Chill… Asian   Side … Vege…        10        15 #>  3 Bathua Raita Rec…      5 Bathua Rai… North … Side … Diab…        10         5 #>  4 Roasted Vegetabl…      5 is a delic… Italia… Appet… Vege…        20        30 #>  5 Moroccan Chicken…      5 Moroccan C… African Main … Non …        20        45 #>  6 Cheese And Corn …      5 Tostados a… Mexican Dinner Vege…        10        20 #>  7 White Bean Pasta…      5 Pasta beco… Italia… Dinner Vege…        10        30 #>  8 Asian Chicken No…      5 is a comfo… Asian   Appet… High…        10        45 #>  9 Thandai Nectarin…      5 Thandai is… Fusion  Desse… Vege…        30        45 #> 10 Watermelon, Chen…      5 Watermelon… Contin… Appet… Vege…        25         0 #> # ℹ 6,493 more rows #> # ℹ 2 more variables: ingredients <chr>, instructions <chr>
